about_the_game:
Simulation Game 2023 gathers all kinds of simulation content to let you experience all kinds of wonderful simulation content. At present, it has included and launched six kinds of simulation content, each of which is an immersive game experience, and will continue to launch the last six kinds of brain hole playing experience

Published



Traffic jam simulation
Experience the first person traffic jam, and the fidgety mood gradually rises! You can also enter classic scripts to summon tanks.

Fishing simulation
It allows you to experience the fun of fishing without leaving home. You can live alone on the cold and frozen land and survive by fishing

Scout simulation
In the cold battlefield, you, as a keen scout, convey coordinates to your sniper teammates and snipe the target

Monster simulation
It's a new experience to play role-playing games with Monster as the protagonists, and occasionally try to experience being chased by heroes

cold noodles simulation
Everyone likes baked cold noodles. Do you know how to make it? Today you are the boss of baked cold noodles. Let's see how many you can sell every day

Horror House simulation
The haunted house that dare not enter in reality. Today, you can experience the exciting atmosphere in the haunted house in the game. Call your partner to try it together

Coffee Hero
The independent game in the first game, inspired and played by a player who can choose characters and change weapons, is currently in the alpha stage

Patient simulation
Playing the role of a patient feeling the warmth and warmth of human relationships in an endless ward, experiencing the cycle of life and death

Gas station simulation
As a gas station employee, you are responsible for the entire gas station. If there are many cars coming, can you be busy? Remember, don't forget to charge for pulling out the oil gun

Goldfish simulation
Does goldfish really only have seven seconds of memory? Is a small fish tank really enough for goldfish to swim? Just give it a try and you'll see

name: Simulators2023

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7 (64x)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD FX 4300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 10
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board Sound Card Compatible with DirectX
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10 (64x)
  • Processor: Intel Core i9 / AMD FX 9590
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 30
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board Sound Card Compatible with DirectX

short_description: Do you like playing various simulation games? You can experience various simulation contents here, such as curiosity, funny, nostalgia, joy and madness
